# WKExtensionDelegateClassName

**Property List Key**

The name of your watchOS app’s extension delegate.

## Discussion

This key provides the name of a class that adopts the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/WatchKit/WKExtensionDelegate] protocol. Xcode automatically includes this key in the WatchKit extension’s information property list when you create a watchOS project from a template. You only modify this value when you rename or replace the extension delegate.

## Extensions and services

- **NSExtension**: The properties of an app extension.
- **NSServices**: The services provided by an app.
- **UIApplicationShortcutWidget**: The bundle ID of the widget that’s available as a Home screen quick action in apps that have more than one widget.
